questions.question: Plagiarism means copying someone else's work without giving them credit.
Junie wasn't finished with her homework, so Arnie let her copy his work.  Is this plagiarism?
Bob used an author's words in his essay.  What should he do?

choices.answer: Insert the author's name and book in the essay.
Provide a citation at the end of the essay.
Put quotation marks around the author's words.

questions.question: When you are doing a report, it is okay to copy and paste from a digital source.
Our student code of conduct includes "Students shall not cheat or copy the work of another."
